items.checkin_comment: Mild pepper flavor from the habanero, making for an easy drinking beer.

items.badge_description: Happy 4th of July! Cheers to celebrating the holiday with good food and great beer!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 100 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 21!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 62)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 63!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 100 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 21!
That's at least one beer a day for seven days. Looks like you had quite the sudsy week. Cheers!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 130 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 27!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 170 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 35!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 45 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 10!
It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 105 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 22.

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 235 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 48!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 85 distinct venues!
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 130 check-ins with a photo.

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 345 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 70!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 65 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 14!
Load up those hops, watch the IBU grow and drink it down! Now you’re all hopped up. The more bitter, the better. That's 25 different beers with an IBU of 65 or higher. Try 5 more for Level 6!

With a bitter bite and a toasted maltiness, this dark style is a perfect combination to be enjoyed any time, day or night. That's 5 different beers with the style of IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Dating back to the 18th century, porters remain an extremely popular style to this day. That is 20 different beers with the style of Porter. Try 5 more Level 5!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 75 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 16!

At first taste, dark ales can be overwhelming for even the most skilled of beer drinkers, but your will is weak and with time you will eventually turn to the dark side. That's 5 different beers with the style of Dark Ale, Belgian Strong Dark Ale, Lager - Euro Dark, Lager - Dark, IPA - Black / Cascadian Dark Ale or IPA - Imperial / Double Black.. Try 5 more for Level 2!

That extra smooth mouth-feel you just experienced is all thanks to the thousands of tiny bubbles created by infused nitrogen. Yum! Check-in 5 times with the serving style of Nitro. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 55 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 12!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 85 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 18!

It’s been a long day and now it’s time for a reward. Crisp, tasty and refreshing, enjoy that delicious fruit beer! That's 25 different beers with the style of Fruit Beer or Sour - Fruited. Try 5 more for Level 6.
Raise your glass and join Untappd this Pride Month as we recognize the impact the LGBTQIA+ community has had on the beer industry.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 2 years on Untappd!

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 35 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 8!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 7)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 35 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 8!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 30 different beers with the style of IPA - New England (Imperial or Single), Pale Ale - New England or IPA - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 7!

Dispensed traditionally by hand pump, cask beers are best served at 55°F. This temperature allows all of the flavor nuances to emerge and permits appreciation of the often unfiltered texture. That's 10 checkins with the serving style of Cask! Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Great beer! Pale ale flavors up front, with a very mild jalapeno note on the back end
